name: Get Info of Cost Estimtes Object
label: Get Info of Cost Estimtes Object

sNo.description: This column will tell the unique number of cost uploaded to be checked for status.

entityType.description: This column will tell for which entity the cost is applied.

entityRefNo.description: This column will tell for which entity the cost is applied.

costComponent.description: This column will have the cost component names.

counterpartyGroupName.description: This column will have the counter partiesâ€™ names.

incExpense.description: This column will tell that the cost is income or expense.

estimateFor.description: This column will tell that for what estimate purpose this cost is for.

rateTypePrice.description: This column will tell the type of rate used for the cost calculation.

costCurve.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
costCurve.description: This column will tell the type of rate used for the cost calculation.

costMonth.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
costMonth.description: This column will have the cost month details.

costValue.description: This column will have the values of the cost.

costCurrency.description: This column will have the currency in which the cost is.

fxToBaseType.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
fxToBaseType.description: This column will tell about which FX to base would be used when cost ccy is different from base ccy

fxtoBaseValue.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
fxtoBaseValue.description: This column will tell about what FX to base value would be used when cost ccy is different from base ccy

fxRate.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
fxRate.description: This column will tell about what FX curve would be used when cost ccy is different from base ccy

fxToPosition.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
fxToPosition.description: This column will tell about what FX to Position value would be used when cost ccy is different from base ccy

fxValueDate.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
fxValueDate.description: This column will tell about what FX Date would be used when cost ccy is different from base ccy

CostValueUnit.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
CostValueUnit.description: This field is optional. only required if Rate Type = Rate and Absolute

itemQty.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}

contractPrice.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
contractPrice.description: This field is optional. only required if Rate Type = % of Price

product.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
product.description: This field is optional. only required to find CostPriceUnitId if Rate Type = Rate

Quantity_Unit.isMandatory: if('${rateTypePrice}' == 'curve') { return true} else { return false}
Quantity_Unit.description: This field is optional. only required to find converion Factor if Rate Type = Rate
